column1: Uchi////It went to my favorite restaurant into a 3 star restaurant. They changed almost everything good on their menu. From ham and eggs
column3: to even fried milk?! Brussels sprouts aren't as crunchy as it use to be. Foie gras is a lot smaller.. Sigh this was a sad day for me. There's no love in the food anymore. And the servers are quick to drop the food off without explaining everything like they use to.
